Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the use of electronic or computerized entry systems and the information that may be gathered from such systems
Summary: Relates to limitations on the use of electronic or computerized entry systems; restricts information that may be gathered on lessees, tenants, owners or guests.
LawCode: Add ยง50-b, Mult Dwell L; add ยง130-a, Mult Res L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law and the multiple residence law, in relation to the use of electronic or computerized entry systems and the information that may be gathered from such systems
